attributes.action: Vaccinate all staff in special needs school’s against COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
The government have deemed it necessary to keep special needs schools open to all children as they are classed as vulnerable, but not made staff a priority to receive the COVID-19 vaccine first. 
Staff at special needs school’s cannot keep their distance from the children and therefore have a higher chance of catching COVID-19. If staff become ill they then can not be there to look after these vulnerable children.
attributes.background: Make it a priority to vaccinate all staff working in special needs schools.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Prioritise special school staff in Covid 19 vaccinations.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566217
